mapper.select: SELECT rv.rvSeq ,rv.rvRank ,rv.rvComment ,rv.rvUseNy ,rv.rvDelNy ,rv.rvDate ,rv.rvFixDate ,rv.product_pdSeq ,rv.member_mmSeq FROM review rv WHERE 1=1 AND rv.rvSeq = #{rvSeq}
mapper.sql: FROM review rv LEFT JOIN member mm ON rv.member_mmSeq = mm.mmSeq LEFT JOIN product pd ON rv.product_pdSeq = pd.pdSeq WHERE 1=1 and rvDelNy = #{shrvDelNy} and rvUseNy = #{shrvUseNy}
